snippet.title: Zero G Arena - Gameplay Trailer 2018
snippet.description:
The latest trailer for Zero G Arena as of 19/06/2018.

There will most likely be another trailer or two before the launch on 08/08/18.
Trailer editing by Max Graw and music by Jon Wood (featured here is a new piece of music that will probably make it into the soundtrack in an extended form).

Official website:
zga.io
Zero G Arena on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/467820/Zero_G_Arena/
Zero G Arena on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/Zero_G_Arena
